findings.title: No Cancellation Mechanism for Mistaken Orders
findings.description: The system lacks a feature to cancel orders placed by mistake, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Two-Factor Authentication Before Order Execution
findings.description: A two-factor authentication mechanism should be implemented before order execution to ensure secure transactions and prevent unauthorized access.

findings.title: Minimum Required Fields Should Be Mentioned with an Asterisk
findings.description: To avoid misplaced orders, it's recommended to clearly indicate minimum required fields with an asterisk and ensure mandatory fields are properly handled.
